text: aap unhen noohî€¼ kee katha sunaayen, jab usane apanee jaati se kahaah he meree jaati! yadi mera tumhaare beech rahana aur tumhen allaah kee aayaton (nishaaniyon) dvaara mera shiksha dena, tumapar bhaaree ho, to allaah heepar mainne bharosa kiya hai. tum mere virudhd jo karana chaaho, use nishchit kar lo aur apane saajhiyon (devee-devataon) ko bhee bula lo. phir tumhaaree yojana tumapar tanik bhee chhupee na rah jaaye, phir jo karana ho, use kar jao aur mujhe koee avasar na do
